relationships.description: Russian forces advanced into Pokrovsk in September 2025 and seized 67.63 percent of the town as of December 2025
Russian forces achieved advances in Oleksandrivka direction and intensified efforts toward the location
Russian forces achieved advances in Hulyaipole direction and began operating within Hulyaipole in early December 2025
Rubikon Center for Advanced Unmanned Technologies is part of Russian forces and responsible for BAI efforts
Russian forces seized Siversk in December 2025
Russian forces use fiber optic drones to interdict Ukrainian GLOCs in Serebryanske forest area
Russian forces prioritized efforts to seize the remainder of Donetsk Oblast in 2025
Russian forces attempted to establish a buffer zone in northern Sumy Oblast
Russian forces attempted to establish a buffer zone in northern Kharkiv Oblast
Pavlo Palisa is Ukrainian Presidential Office Deputy Head
Russian forces attempted to push into southeastern Dnipropetrovsk Oblast
Russian forces seized Velyka Novosilka in late January 2025
Russian sabotage and reconnaissance groups infiltrated toward Dobropillya in August 2025
Russian forces conducted offensive operations northeast of Slovyansk
Russian forces advanced into Lyman in December 2025
Russian forces completed seizure of Toretsk by August 1, 2025
Russian forces began efforts to seize Kostyantynivka in October 2025
Russian forces completed efforts to push Ukrainian forces out of Kursk Oblast in March 2025
Russian forces opened an offensive toward Velykyi Burluk in July 2025
Russian military command intensified efforts to seize Kupyansk in Summer 2025
Russian forces conducted operations in Zaporizhia Oblast, facing constraints from Ukrainian defenses
Russian advances toward Orikhiv were constrained by Ukrainian defenses
Russian military command intends to advance on Zaporizhzhia City
Russian forces spent 18 months fighting to seize the Pokrovsk-Myrnohrad area
Ukrainian Unmanned Systems Forces is a Ukrainian military branch
Robert Brovdi is the USF Commander
USF elements struck a Russian oil depot in occupied Rovenky
USF elements struck positions of the Russian Rubikon-D Spetsnaz unit (Rubikon Center)
USF elements struck positions of the 74th Motorized Rifle Brigade
74th Motorized Rifle Brigade is part of 41st Combined Arms Army
41st Combined Arms Army is part of Central Military District
USF elements struck positions of the 589th Motorized Rifle Regiment
589th Motorized Rifle Regiment is part of 27th Motorized Rifle Division
27th Motorized Rifle Division is part of 2nd Combined Arms Army
2nd Combined Arms Army is part of Central Military District
USF elements struck Russian positions near Selydove, Donetsk Oblast
USF elements struck substations in occupied Melitopol
USF elements struck substations in occupied Molochansk
USF elements struck the base of the Russian 92nd River Boat Brigade
USF elements struck near Olenivka, Crimea
USF elements struck Russian ammunition depots near Blizhnye
USF elements struck Russian ammunition depots near Siatel
Russian forces were struck at locations in Crimea by Ukrainian forces
Russian forces were struck at locations in Luhansk Oblast by Ukrainian forces
Russian defense industrial base supports Russian forces with production of missiles and drones
People's Republic of China provides critical components to Russian defense industrial base
North Korea provides KN-23 missiles and labor to Russia's Shahed-producing factory
Republic of Tatarstan hosts Shahed-producing factory for Russian defense industrial base
Ukrainian General Staff is the Ukrainian military command headquarters
Kremlin is the Russian government that commands Russian forces
Ukraine is defending against Russian advances
